title: Ghostrunner 2 Soundtrack
description: Immerse yourself in the synthwave beats of Ghostrunner 2 with the Original Soundtrack. Including 23 songs created by Daniel Deluxe, We Are Magonia, Gost, Dan Terminus, and Arkadiusz Reikowski.
longDescription:
Immerse yourself in the synthwave beats of Ghostrunner 2 with the Original Soundtrack. Including 23 songs created by Daniel Deluxe, We Are Magonia, Gost, Dan Terminus, and Arkadiusz Reikowski.  
 
# Ghostrunner 2 OST
